headline: Edwards’ study demonstrates value in early aortic stenosis intervention
summary: The study found that early intervention led to an 80% reduction in heart failure hospitalisations one year after treatment.

raw.headline: Edwards’ study demonstrates value in early aortic stenosis intervention
raw.summary: The study found that early intervention led to an 80% reduction in heart failure hospitalisations one year after treatment.

headline: Edwards' New Late-Breaking Data on Severe AS Expected to Boost Stock
summary: EW's new late-breaking clinical data shows early intervention in AS may slash significant costs and improve patient outcomes.

raw.headline: Edwards' New Late-Breaking Data on Severe AS Expected to Boost Stock
raw.summary: EW's new late-breaking clinical data shows early intervention in AS may slash significant costs and improve patient outcomes.

headline: Edwards Lifesciences - Prompt Intervention for Severe Aortic Stenosis Patients Demonstrates Lower Healthcare Costs, Improved Clinical Outcomes
summary: PARIS - Edwards Lifesciences announced new economic and clinical evidence on severe aortic stenosis presented as a late-breaking clinical trial at EuroPCR 2025, further contributing to the extensive...
